titleStmt.title: An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament for disbanded souldiers and others pretending to be reduced to depart from the cities of London and Westminster by the 15th of this instant July 1647.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: "Ordered by the Commons assembled in Parliament that this ordinance be forthwith printed and published. H. Elsynge, Cler. Parl. D. Com."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
